options.explain:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave
options.explainDetail:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05. (Cooldown: 1 sec. Inflicts 6% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shock wave energy is charged every 0.1 sec. after cooldown. (Charged up to 9 times)
- Charging generates bigger shock waves with attacks, increasing Neutral Gauge reduction and shock wave damage +100% per charge.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave (Max Stacks: 30)
- Additional Damage Value Buff stacks +1 per charge

options.explain:
Attacks generate shock waves.
Attacking enemies after they're hit by the shock waves 5 times Stuns them and decreases their Neutralize gauge -1.5.

Attacking Stunned enemies 3 times increases their Stun duration +3 sec.

Damage Value +782 if an enemy with a destroyed Neutralize gauge exists
options.explainDetail:
Attacks generate shock waves. (Cooldown: 0.5 sec. Inflicts 30% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Damage Value +6252 for 20 sec. per shock wave (Max Stacks: 1)
Attacking enemies after they're hit by the shock waves 5 times Stuns them and decreases their Neutralize gauge -1.5. (Cooldown: 8 sec.)

Attacking Stunned enemies 3 times increases their Stun duration +3 sec. (Cooldown: 5 sec.)

Damage Value +782 if an enemy with a destroyed Neutralize gauge exists

options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of creating an orb for 10 sec. that applies the following effects when obtained.
- Black Orb: Attack Speed +8% and Casting Speed +12% for 15 sec.
- White Orb: A barrier by 10% of Max HP for 15 sec.
Obtaining this orb decreases your HP/MP -1% and increases Movement Speed +20% for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of creating an orb for 10 sec. that applies the following effects when obtained. (Cooldown: 1 sec.)
- Black Orb: Attack Speed +8% and Casting Speed +12% for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 3)
- White Orb: A barrier by 10% of Max HP for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
Obtaining this orb decreases your HP/MP -1% and increases Movement Speed +20% for 15 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
